returns._0: price Price of the token in wei

params.twapInterval: TWAP interval in seconds (time window for average price)

returns.price: Price of the token in wei

getRecentPriceInETH(address).notice: Get the recent price of a token against ETH/WETH

getTWAPInWETH(address,uint32).notice: Return the price of a token against WETH in wei format
